metadata.name: Mrs Always Right
metadata.description:
This image is my humble dedicated to the grandeur of the Lion King and Queen. 

"The Lion may be the king of the jungle but at home; wife is always right". That's exactly what came in my mind when I was photographing this power couple having their domestic tussle. He was in the mood and she wasn't & when she says 'No'  - she means it. 

Artist: Baishakhi Mazumder
Edition : 1/1
Location : Masai Mara National Park - Kenya
Year: Created: 2021
Size: â€Š3500 x 2333
Gear: Nikon D850 - Nikkor 300mm F2.8
Genre: Wildlife
